it.azraelsec.Document

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.azraelsec.Document.Document
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Document class represents a document managed by TURING system. Each document is made up by a number of Sections and is stored on the Server as a directory which contains a number of different files.
    Author:
    Federico Gerardi, https://azraelsec.github.io/
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
